description: A complete Rust implementation of an AngelScript scripting engine

features.name: Unified Type Registry
features.description: Central registry for all type entries with TypeHash identity

features.name: Lexer
features.description: Full tokenization with span tracking for all AngelScript tokens

features.name: AST Parser
features.description: Recursive descent parser for types, expressions, statements, declarations

features.name: Visitor Pattern
features.description: Zero-cost AST traversal abstraction with 50+ visit methods

features.name: Procedural Macros
features.description: Derive macros for Any, function registration, interface definition

features.name: Standard Library: Math
features.description: Math module with trigonometry, power, rounding functions

features.name: Standard Library: String
features.description: String type with manipulation functions

features.name: Standard Library: Array
features.description: Array template type with iteration and manipulation

features.name: Standard Library: Dictionary
features.description: Dictionary type for key-value storage

features.name: Compiler Foundation
features.description: Error types, ExprInfo, OpCode, BytecodeChunk, Constants

features.name: String Factory
features.description: Configurable string factory for custom string types

features.name: Compilation Context
features.description: Compilation context with scope management

features.name: Type Resolution
features.description: Resolve AST types to registry TypeEntry

features.name: Template Instantiation
features.description: Generic template instantiation with type substitution and caching

features.name: Conversion System
features.description: Implicit/explicit type conversions (primitives, handles, user-defined)

features.name: Overload Resolution
features.description: Function overload resolution with ranking

features.name: Registration Pass
features.description: First compiler pass: register script types and functions

features.name: Local Scope
features.description: Local variable scope management

features.name: Bytecode Emitter
features.description: High-level bytecode emission API with jump management

features.name: Expression Compilation - Basics
features.description: Compile literals, identifiers, unary/binary operators

features.name: Expression Compilation - Calls
features.description: Function calls, method calls, constructor calls

features.name: Expression Compilation - Advanced
features.description: Cast, lambda, init lists, ternary operator

features.name: Statement Compilation - Basics
features.description: Blocks, variable declarations, return, if/while

features.name: Statement Compilation - Loops
features.description: For loops, switch, break/continue

features.name: Function Compilation
features.description: Compile function bodies, handle parameters and returns

features.name: Integration Testing
features.description: End-to-end integration tests

features.name: FFI Registration Gaps
features.description: Fill gaps in FFI type registration

features.name: Multi-Section Compilation
features.description: Compile multiple script sections together
